messages.message: :jenkins: as part of the effort to resolve some of the jenkins issue surf up recently, tonight we are going to take down preprod jenkins and upgrade to new LTS version in order to install some of the plugins with latest versions so we can get some of the bug fixes in those plugins, ETA starting time 7PM PST and be done within 1-2 hours.
this is still in progress, we will have to restart jenkins again in the next hour or so, we will update here once all clear
